net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_getEquipmentInput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
<html><pre>Returns a String suitable for input() for the given equipment item. arg(0) = (Optional) Equipment item Returns: Input string. If no item was given, an input string with blank values will be returned.
Input String populates variables:
eqName: Equipment name eqQuantity: Number equipped eqValue: Purchase price of a single unit eqWeight: Weight of a single unit eqContainer: Container equipment is in, if any eqDescription: Description of the item eqCarried: If this item is caried or equipped eqDelete: If this item should be deleted
